channel.title: I'm Amin Tahmasbi on Amin Tahmasbi
channel.description: Recent content in I'm Amin Tahmasbi on Amin Tahmasbi

item.title: About Me
item.description: Self-driving Car Engineer Build and investigate Computer Vision and Deep Learning applications for Autonomous Driving and Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems. Data Scientist Collect, store, transform, aggregate, and optimize data from various sensors for connected and automated vehicle applications. Software Engineer Develope programs in Python and C++ to interface with vehicles, build data pipelines, and demonstrate research ideas.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Estimation of Lead Vehicle Kinematics Using Camera-Based Data for Driver Distraction Detection Feng, F.; Bao, S.; Jin, J.; Sun, W.; Saigusa, S.; Tahmasbi-Sarvestani, A.; Dsa, J.; 2018 International Journal of Automotive Engineering. Composite alpha-mu Based DSRC Channel Model Using Large Data Set of RSSI Measurements Mahjoub, H. N.; Tahmasbi-Sarvestani, A.; Gani, SM.O.; Fallah, Y. P.; 2018 IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems. A Learning-based Stochastic MPC Design for Cooperative Adaptive Cruise Control to Handle Interfering Vehicles Kazemi, H.
